metadata.title: CVE-2021-39940 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.2 before 14.3.6, all versions starting from 14.4 before14.4.4, all versions starting from 14.5 before 14.5.2. GitLab Maven Packageregistry is vulnerable to a regular expression denial of service when aspecifically crafted string is sent.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
